name: Tap the ✨GLOWING SQUARE✨
description:
A magical ✨GLOWING SQUARE✨appear on your screen?!

What could you do better than TAPPING it ? 😮

TAP
TAP
TAP THE
✨GLOWING SQUARE✨

This game was only meant to make me familiar with the Ceramic engine.

It is designed to be played on mobile.
